decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, Proposed Block Plan, Design and Access Statement, 696-100-AL.dwg, 696-101-AL.dwg, 696-102-AL.dwg, 696-103-AL.dwg, 696-104-AL.dwg, 696-110-AL.dwg, 696-110-AL.dwg, 696-120-AL.dwg, and 696-121-AL.dwg received: 07/08/2017. Flood Risk Assessment received: 14/07/2017. 696-111-AL.dwg and 696-112-AL.dwg received: 01/09/2017. 696-140-AL.dwg, 696-141-AL.dwg, 696-142-AL.dwg, 696-143-AL.dwg, 696-144-AL.dwg, 696-150-AL.dwg, 696-151-AL.dwg, 696-152-AL.dwg, 696-160-AL.dwg, and 696-161-AL.dwg received: 12/09/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Reduction of the existing rear extension and conversion of existing pitched roof to a flat roof with pitched skylights on the side infill.
